column5: Has anyone flown into South Lake with Due North Outposts? This camp was new to Due North Outposts in 2005, so some other outfitter must have flown into that lake previously. I can't seem to find any info at all on this lake on the Canada Forum. Any info woulf be great. Also looking at Whitebirch lake with the same outfitter.
Sorry, but I have no information on these lakes. I did, however, spend last week with Due North at another lake of theirs. Send me a message if you want more information about the operation.
